learning_objective: Collect and present the same data in various visual formats.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex works in a factory building car engines. They are asked to chart the number of defective parts found in their inspections every day for one month. Here are their results: Week 1 = 30, Week 2 = 25, Week 3 = 15, and Week 4 = 10. Which of the following are appropriate ways for Alex to present this data visually?",
    "Answer1": "Pie chart only",
    "Answer2": "Line chart only",
    "Answer3": "Bar chart only",
    "Answer4": "Both the line chart and the bar chart",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "Both a bar chart and a line chart can be used to properly visualize the week-by-week changes in defective parts counted. A pie chart wouldn't be helpful in this scenario because it is better suited to compare parts of a whole, while in this situation, it is important to show the change of numbers over time."
}
